publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3681 Anne McLaughlin: Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day—That the Parliament congratulates Govan Integration Network and its member organisations for their outstanding work in organising an international women’s day event on 10 March 2009 at Govanhill Neighbourhood Centre; acknowledges that the free event offered workshops, spa treatments and information stalls with many useful resources; notes that the event was very well attended by local women from diverse age, ethnic and cultural groups, and salutes the organisations instrumental in its planning, including Crossroads Youth and Community Association, Glasgow City Council, Culture and Sport Glasgow, Glasgow South East Regeneration Agency, Home-Start, Karibu and Govanhill Social Inclusion Project.
S3M-3681 Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day (lodged on 11 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3681 Anne McLaughlin: Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day—That the Parliament congratulates Govan Integration Network and its member organisations for their outstanding work in organising an international women’s day event on 10 March 2009 at Govanhill Neighbourhood Centre; acknowledges that the free event offered workshops, spa treatments and information stalls with many useful resources; notes that the event was very well attended by local women from diverse age, ethnic and cultural groups, and salutes the organisations instrumental in its planning, including Crossroads Youth and Community Association, Glasgow City Council, Culture and Sport Glasgow, Glasgow South East Regeneration Agency, Home-Start, Karibu and Govanhill Social Inclusion Project. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Aileen Campbell*, Alasdair Allan*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-3681 Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day (lodged on 11 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-3681 Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day (lodged on 11 March 2009) Bob Doris*
S3M-3681 Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day (lodged on 11 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3681 Congratulations to Govanhill International Women’s Day (lodged on 11 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
